item.title: Creating a clean presentation style in 40 commits (redux)
item.description: A while back, a had created a git based tutorial for learning how to create a presentation style in ConTeXt. I chose a git based style so that it was easy to see what changed in each commit and what effect did the change have on the output. But it is cumbersome to work with, especially if you are new to ConTeXt as well as git.

item.title: Creating a clean presentation style in 40 commits
item.description: Did you always want to learn ConTeXt, but did not know where to start? I have written a git-based tutorial that should help you get started.
